}} 'Atomic' (stylised 'ATOMIC!') is an extended play (EP) by English electronic
musician and producer Labrinth. Written and recorded throughout 2012, it was self-
released on Labrinth's own label Odd Child Recordings on 1 February 2013 as a
free digital download.
